metadata.title: CVE-2021-4209 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS. As Nettle's hashupdate functions internally call memcpy, providing zero-length input maycause undefined behavior. This flaw leads to a denial of service afterauthentication in rare circumstances.

criterions.comment: gnutls26 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
gnutls26 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
